title: Best of The Herd: 05/20/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/20/2019
description:
Colin stands strong with Stephen Curry believing he has changed the entire basketball world and might even be the best player on the Warriors. The New York Jets would be making a bad move by hiring Peyton Manning as the new football president, the Toronto Raptors and Milwaukee Bucks are playing their hearts out just to receive second place in the Finals against the Warriors, Baker Mayfield needs to understand that being a starting quarterback comes with criticism and Colin explains the many chapters of Kevin Durant's career. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
